title: F/S - 1909 S74 White w/Backing and Colors - HOF!!! UPDATED

posts.post_title: F/S - 1909 S74 White w/Backing and Colors - HOF!!! UPDATED
posts.post_content:
For sale are the following S74 silks including both white with backing and colors.  Pricing includes shipping and insurance.  checks or money orders are preferred but I will accept PayPal F/F also. Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Bresnahan (White - Turkey Red) - $225- SOLD
Chance (White - Old Mill) - $150 - SOLD
Mattern (White - Old Mill) - $110 - SOLD
Sheckard (White - Old Mill) - $110
Bresnahan (Yellow - Old Mill) - $225
Clarke (Yellow - Old Mill) - $225
Hauser (Blue - Turkey Red) - $110
Mitchell (Gold - Turkey Red) - $110
